page.title: 06FAMOUS PEOPLE
page.content: { { }Jock Taylor lived in Pencaitland before his tragic accident in Finland in August 1982.Jock Taylor won the TT races in the Isle of Man four times!He also won the world sidecar racing championship in 1980.His partner on the sidecar was Benga Johnson who was Swedish.Jock Taylor was 28 when he had his accident. The football team for Pencaitland (Pencaitland Amateur Football Club) won the Scottish Amateur Cup in 1984.They had previously made it to the final in 1962,but they were beaten.The manager/player for Pencaitland is Arthur Macleod.He was on weekend sports special on the Friday before the match on Saturday. The Scottish Amateur Cup Finals usually take place at Hampden in Glasgow.the son of Arthur Macleod
